headline: Is DaVita Inc. (DVA) the Best Stock to Buy According to Billionaire Warren Buffett?
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Best Stocks to Buy According to Billionaire Warren Buffett. In this article, we are going to take a look at where DaVita Inc.
